bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: SVHN fetcher URL is timing out
bug.description:
Currently timing out for me and at least one other user: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/988630b1c8cde8da6414ca80d146097c902993fb/deeplearning4j-data/deeplearning4j-datasets/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/datasets/fetchers/SvhnDataFetcher.java#L49>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/988630b1c8cde8da6414ca80d146097c902993fb/deeplearning4j-data/deeplearning4j-datasets/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/datasets/fetchers/SvhnDataFetcher.java#L49</denchmark-link>
No idea if this is permanent or temporary. Either way: if we can, we should host this dataset on a web server that we control.

comments.comment: Looks like this was just temporary - perhaps for now we'll leave it as-is and review if it happens again.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
